message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a fantastic product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your product recommendation. I would like to counteroffer at $95.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I'm counteroffering at $110.
I understand your position, Alice. I would like to counteroffer at $100.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to ensure I get a good deal. I'm counteroffering at $115.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I am willing to pay $105 for the product.
I'm glad we're still in negotiations, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $110, but I think I can do better than that. I'm counteroffering at $112.50
Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I am willing to pay $107.5 for the product.
I'm still confident we can reach a mutually beneficial deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $110, but I'm not willing to go any lower. I'm counteroffering at $110
Thank you for your efforts, Alice. I am willing to pay $108 for the product.
